protein.specific_function: Involved in redox regulation of the cell. Can reduce H(2)O(2) and short chain organic, fatty acid, and phospholipid hydroperoxides. May play a role in the regulation of phospholipid turnover as well as in protection against oxidative injury.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on paired donors, with incorporation or reduction of molecular oxygen
